alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 513 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, or over Pembroke Pines, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Miami Gardens, Weston, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Opa-Locka, Royal Palm Ranches, Palm Springs North, Sunshine Acres, Country Club, Miramar Parkway And University Drive, Pine Island Ridge, Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, Nova Southeastern University and Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
